event.doc_name: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

evidence.text: vacating the pretrial deadlines, the Final Pretrial Conference and the Trial date

add_extracted.value: Vacating pretrial deadlines, Final Pretrial Conference, and Trial date

evidence.text: this action only is stayed pending further stipulation or motion of the Parties or Order of the Court

add_extracted.value: Staying the case pending further stipulation or motion

evidence.text: the Parties shall provide a joint status report every 60 days
The Court approves the Settlements of the claims of minor Plaintiffs B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A. in this Lawsuit.
evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

add_extracted.value: Approval of settlements for minor plaintiffs' claims

evidence.text: The Court approves the allocation of the Settlement proceeds as follows:
evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

add_extracted.value: Allocation of settlement proceeds as specified

evidence.text: The Court approves placement of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.’s portions of the Settlements into pooled minors’ trusts operated by Legacy Enhancement until they reach the age of 18, 21, or 25.
evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

add_extracted.value: Placement of settlement portions into pooled minors’ trusts

evidence.text: Plaintiffs’ counsel shall coordinate with C.M., L.G., O.A., and V.C. and Legacy Enhancement Trust for the execution of all necessary paperwork and funding of the pooled minors’ trusts on behalf of B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A.’s and shall report back to the Court once funding is completed.
evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims

add_extracted.value: Coordination with counsel for trust funding
